isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9800 - SPICER 13-INCH (310 MM) AND 14-INCH (350 MM) ANGLE-RING SINGLE PLATE PUSH-TYPE CLUTCH - CLEAN AND INSPECT

step1.para: Clean the clutch assembly thoroughly. If excessive wear or damage is evident, or if parts are in questionable condition, replace them with new clutch and driven disc assemblies.

note.para: It is not feasible to rebuild this design clutch.

step1.para: Check the friction surface of the flywheel for cracks and scoring. Replace the flywheel, or reface its surface as necessary. Refer to Group 12 - ENGINE.
Check the pilot bearing, release bearing, release yoke and the linkage for excessive wear. Replace worn and defective components.
Remove any oil or grease from the flywheel and bell housing area.
